properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL out 20 NM; Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL from 20 to 60 NM excluding the territorial waters of Bahamas
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 20 at 5:08PM EST until January 22 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
6 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL
out 20 NM and Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL
from 20 to 60 NM excluding the territorial waters of Bahamas.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to at least 7 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

A sudden onset of rough seas may cause hazardous conditions,
which may occur suddenly at jetties and inlets. These conditions
could catch boaters by surprise. Boaters should use caution when
entering or exiting the inlets and jetty areas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY
